mapper.insert: insert into checkapply (id, Medical_Id, Creation_Time, Total_Sum, Objective, User_Id, state, Invoice_Number, DelMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update checkapply set Medical_Id = #{medicalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Creation_Time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Total_Sum = #{totalSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Objective = #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, User_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Invoice_Number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DelMark = #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Medical_Id, Creation_Time, Total_Sum, Objective, User_Id, state, Invoice_Number, DelMark from checkapply where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, Medical_Id, Creation_Time, Total_Sum, Objective, User_Id, state, Invoice_Number, DelMark from checkapply

select c.id, c.Medical_Id, c.Creation_Time, c.Total_Sum, c.Objective, c.User_Id, c.state, c.Invoice_Number, c.DelMark,d.id did, d.CheckAppId, d.CheckProjId, d.DeptId, d.CreationTime, d.Position, d.State dstate, d.Price, d.Identification, d.InspectTime, d.Result, d.ResultTime, d.operatorId, d.entryClerkId, d.DelMark ddelmark from checkapply c left join checkdetailed d on c.id = d.CheckAppId

select c.id, c.Medical_Id, c.Creation_Time, c.Total_Sum, c.Objective, c.User_Id, c.state, c.Invoice_Number, c.DelMark,d.id did, d.CheckAppId, d.CheckProjId, d.DeptId, d.CreationTime, d.Position, d.State dstate, d.Price, d.Identification, d.InspectTime, d.Result, d.ResultTime, d.operatorId, d.entryClerkId, d.DelMark ddelmark from checkapply c inner join checkdetailed d on c.id = d.CheckAppId where c.Medical_Id = #{medicalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c.id, c.Medical_Id, c.Creation_Time, c.Total_Sum, c.Objective, c.User_Id, c.state, c.Invoice_Number, c.DelMark,d.id did, d.CheckAppId, d.CheckProjId, d.DeptId, d.CreationTime, d.Position, d.State dstate, d.Price, d.Identification, d.InspectTime, d.Result, d.ResultTime, d.operatorId, d.entryClerkId, d.DelMark ddelmark from checkapply c inner join checkdetailed d on c.id = d.CheckAppId where c.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
